ygData.msgSnippet: Grenades explode near Ice sending rock and Ice shrapnel into the coat of her Polar bear form. Wait, we re here to help. she shouted falling back and trying

Grenades explode near Ice sending rock and Ice shrapnel into the coat of her
Polar bear form. "Wait, we're here to help." she shouted falling back and
trying to avoid any further attacks.

Lunarpine heard the explosions and rushed to help, he knew that if the new
bot did anything to hurt Ice it would regret it with every function of it's
master circuit.
----- Original Message -----
From: Beast Wars <beastwars@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 10, 2001 11:00 AM
Subject: Re: Say Welcome to Grizzltron

   Grizzltron sees Ice's shadow on the wall. He presses his gernade
launcher's trigger twice.  <<BOOM>>
